title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: projecting from the base of the Woodhill.* Three miles from Alva is Tillicoultry, and at the distance of other three miles (being in all 13 miles from Stirling) is the town of Dollar.— [/«» ; Castle Campbell Inn.]

title: The X jewel,

snippet: lie then attempted to cross from Alva to Blackford, a wild road, and rough for horses.
